meta.name: DESCRIPTION
meta.value: Remove "ADOBE PDF" build if not required for your MC

para.text: The Z-axis motor is removed during shipping and required to be mounted.

li.text: Confirm that the Motor mounting surface [1] is free from dust and other foreign matter.
Place the Motor [4] and the coupling into the Z-axis ball screw shaft [2].
Secure the Motor [4] to the mounting surface [1] using washers and the mounting screws [5].
Tighten the clamping bolts of the coupling [3] to the Z-axis Ball Screw shaft [2].
Tightening torque: 33 Nm (Mayr coupling) / 20 Nm (Miki pulley coupling)
While tightening, make sure that the Z-axis Ball Screw does not rotate.
Connect the signal and power cables to the Motor [4].

para.text: This completes the Z-axis Motor mounting procedure.
